publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-7963 Johann Lamont: Supporting Rape Survivorsâ€”That the Parliament is gravely concerned that the crime of rape continues to be underreported; believes that no woman is ever to blame for being raped, and recognises the need to change public attitudes to rape to ensure that survivors feel able to report or speak out about being raped without the fear of being blamed or disbelieved. Supported by: Bill Butler*, Michael McMahon*, Patricia Ferguson*, Christina McKelvie*, Bill Kidd*, Jackie Baillie*, Joe FitzPatrick*, Rhona Brankin*, Margaret Smith*, Robin Harper*, Jim Tolson*, Trish Godman*, Stuart McMillan*, Elaine Smith*, Patrick Harvie*, Marlyn Glen*, Shirley-Anne Somerville*, Sandra White*, John Park*, Pauline McNeill*, Mary Mulligan*, Dr Richard Simpson*
S3M-7963 Supporting Rape Survivors (lodged on 17 February 2011) Jack McConnell*, Karen Whitefield*, Stewart Maxwell*, George Foulkes*, Sarah Boyack*, Maureen Watt*
S3M-7963 Supporting Rape Survivors (lodged on 17 February 2011) Claire Baker*, Mike Pringle*, Jamie Hepburn*, Cathie Craigie*
S3M-7963 Supporting Rape Survivors (lodged on 17 February 2011) Linda Fabiani*, Mr Frank McAveety*
S3M-7963 Supporting Rape Survivors (lodged on 17 February 2011) Bob Doris*, Dave Thompson*, Hugh Henry*
S3M-7963 Supporting Rape Survivors (lodged on 17 February 2011) Gil Paterson*, Irene Oldfather*
S3M-7963 Supporting Rape Survivors (lodged on 17 February 2011) Peter Peacock*
